Posts.Content: Hey these are really good tips especially the soup! Im going to try the heat pads nxt time and maybe the codeine? My friend sat with me this time and although she was lovely company to catch up at times i was so tired felt like a nap but didnt want to be rude..she wouldnt have minded!  Do you always take someone with you all the time or go alone? I might suggest someone coming in 2nd half way through so i can have a quick nap!  Good luck to everyone having chemo this month and the cold cap.xxx
